nodes.text: The Mark VIII Sentinel was a model of three-legged battle droid produced by Holowan Laboratories on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Produced at their Holowan Labs facility in the Network Security District, a number of Mark VIII Sentinel units were used to patrol the facility.
The Holowan Mark VIII Sentinel appears as enemies in the Imperial Heroic mission "Glitch" on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
